TopicTitle: [11/26/15 Update] Say Hello to the Light-Green Group!

Articles.Content: Congrats!

I'm number 12 on the forum right now. That's actually really scary.

I'm #252.

...

Wow.

EDIT:

Yeesh, and #123 in post count.

EDIT AGAIN:

*maniacal laughter*

Three rep bars! XD

Edited January 14, 2015 by Starwhip

I'm almost exactly halfway! That's progress right there! Now it's only a matter of time-

*looks at joindate*

*realizes how long it took just to get here*

Oh.

Well if I count my old account I've got 416 points... :/ Half on each account.

almost there kind of...

UpsilonAerospace, since this is kind of your thing, I think you need to make another thread.. or maybe another section to this one.

"Say Hello to the Dark Red Group"

There are currently 1+ people on the forum who have more/less? than 500 points of -Rep. This gives them one or more dark-red bars on their Reputation counter, meaning that they are... the INfamous Dark-Red Group!

(Search for the Green Iron Crown)

http://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/members/138610-Green-Iron-Crown

Yeah I just saw that today! Who is this monster?

I'm fairly certain I know who it really is.. Don't really want to spoil the fun though.

First of all, consider that the Green Iron Crown is an artificial creation.

Second, consider who has the ability to do such a thing. In a conversation regarding negative rep "In any case, Kaspy's disabled the feature entirely for the present so it can't cause any more trouble." Quoted from this thread: http://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/106795-Negative-rep-!/page3

Third, consider the implications of this thread, specifically the odds of this encounter occurring, as well as the close timings. http://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/36348-Guess-Who-Will-Reply-Next?p=1667731#post1667731

The truth is far stranger than you can surmise!

Green Iron Crown will only show when his name is mentioned.

He sees all. He hears all...

Green Iron Crown is coming for us

Using math*, I have determined the post that would get the most rep from everyone. (yes, everyone)

A hi-res imgur album of a U.S.S enterprise (star trek original series, not the naval sea ship in real life) being carried on a boat hanger with a Saturn V replica as a missile, complete with video, witty comments, and a space shuttle, for good measure. Oh, and a car replica, as well.

With .craft downloads.
